subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Simple FM Sweep Radio Design/you_can_help.mp3 
  Uploaded by : urkel232002 <urkel23@...> 
  Description : "You Can Help"---The goal is to find out how we can help them.  Are they earthbound?  Are they in visitation?  What can we do on this side to help them more on or maybe they are trying to help us. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Simple%20FM%20Sweep%20Radio%20Design/you_can_help.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/help/us/groups/files

Regards,

urkel232002 <urkel23@...>
